attributes.action: Bring back Gosport Haslar Hospital or use part of it for an A&E Department
attributes.background:
Portsmouth QA Hospital is struggling to say the very least. Myself and the Undersigned are petitioning that the Government bring back Gosport Haslar Hospital or part of Haslar Hospital to be used as an A&E Department to help relieve the strain on QA Hospital. 
Less waiting times & more lives saved.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the former Royal Haslar Military hospital is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The former hospital is now the responsibility of private owners.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to provide a new A&E department or a new hospital, if that's what you'd like to happen.
